name: First United Methodist Church of London
description: Historic United Methodist church serving the London, Kentucky community since 1825. Offers traditional worship services at 8:30 AM and 11:00 AM on Sundays, with live broadcasts on WFTG 106.9 FM and 1400 AM radio, and live streaming via 1umctv.com and Facebook. Provides comprehensive community services including a food pantry stocked with non-perishable items for church members and community residents in need. The church focuses on worship, community outreach, and mission work both locally and internationally.
source: Verified from official website and multiple sources
hours_of_operation: Sunday Services: 8:30 AM and 11:00 AM. Church Office and Food Pantry: Monday-Thursday 10:00 AM-2:00 PM. Food pantry available during office hours.
eligibility: Food pantry services available to church members and community residents in need
services: Worship services, Sunday School, Food pantry, Community outreach, Mission work, Prayer ministry, Live radio broadcasts, Live streaming services
notes: Church has 1.3K+ followers on Facebook and is rated 4.9/5 on Google with 15 reviews. Food pantry offers canned soups, vegetables, cereals, peanut butter, pasta, and similar non-perishable items. Services are broadcast live on radio and streamed online.
